Encounter.Name: Nexu Stalking
Encounter.Notes: A solitary nexu is stalking the characters. If the PCs are keeping an acitve watch or are alerted to the nexu's presence, they may make an [B]opposed Perception vs. Stealth check[b]. If the PCs are distracted by other events, the nexu instead makes an [B]opposed Stealth vs. Perception check[b]. Add [SETBACK][SETBACK] if watchful PCs might notice the nexu.
